brainly_data.question:
Which sentence from the passage is a major supporting detail in "An Automated Society"?

A. Robots could work faster and more accurately.

B. With the rise of industrial robots, many unskilled laborers lost their jobs.

C. Will super-intelligent androids obey their human programmers?

D. A single robotic "arm" or "hand" could do the work of several humans.
brainly_data.subject: English
